permissions: User must be an admin or a manager member of the broker organization.
side_effects: Updates the specified lineup scenario fields.
validation_notes: Requires lineup scenario ID argument; must specify at least one of --name or --include-trucker-assignments-as-constraints; only name and include_trucker_assignments_as_constraints are updatable, while date, window, add_lineups_automatically, broker, and customer are create-only.
